name: Data Scientist (Sustainability) Full Curriculum (EQF Level 8)
description: Full curriculum for Data Scientist (Sustainability) at EQF Level 8
program_learning_outcomes: Create new knowledge that advances the field of digital sustainability through rigorous research
Develop theoretical frameworks that integrate sustainability principles with digital transformation paradigms
Design and validate innovative methodologies for measuring and enhancing sustainability in digital contexts
Lead innovative research addressing complex sustainability challenges at the intersection of digital technology and environmental systems
Contribute to policy development and standards for sustainable digital transformation at national and international levels
Advance pedagogical approaches for digital sustainability education and professional development

modules.name: Net-Zero IT Infrastructure (EQF 8 Version)
modules.description: Principles and practices for carbon-neutral IT infrastructures (This module has been adapted for EQF level 8.)
learning_outcomes: Critically evaluate approaches for achieving carbon neutrality in IT infrastructure.
Evaluate strategies for measuring and reducing carbon footprint of technology systems.
Design and implement net-zero IT infrastructures in various organizational contexts.
